# Deployment job to run things
# @Since: 28-FEB-2017
# @Version: 20170322.0  #- Initial version
# @Author: Jac. Beekers
#
#Parameters:
# MaxConcurrent - How many steps may be running concurrently. Only valid when you use the parameter Wait=No for a step.
#
# Format
#|App Name|Job Name|Args|
#|Order|StepName|StepType|Connection|sql file|ExpectedResult|Param1=Val1|Param2=Val2|....

!define jobName {Unit Test Job Dependencies}
!define ..FrontPage.ExamplesJac.TestJac.TryOutJobList.SqlFilter {REPLACE('${jobName}${PAGE_NAME}',' ','')}

!|Table:Job Definition                                                                                                                                                                         |
|Tryout|${jobName} ${PAGE_NAME}|Persistence=Yes|MaxConcurrent=2|ScriptDir=/rabo/sserole/tws/scripts|IDQConfig=/rabo/sserole/tws/config/idq.cfg|DB2Config=/rabo/sserole/tws/config/rundb2sql.cfg|
|Steps                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|10    |Run Script1 60 seconds |run Script     |shell          |script=longrunning.sh              |Args=60                                   |Wait=No                                         |
|20    |Run Script2 60 seconds |run Script     |shell          |script=longrunning.sh              |Args=60                                   |Wait=No                                         |
|100   |Run Script3 60 seconds |run Script     |shell          |script=longrunning.sh              |Args=60                                   |Wait=No                                         |
|220   |Run Script4 60 seconds |run Script     |shell          |script=longrunning.sh              |Args=60                                   |Wait=No                                         |
|999   |Wait for scripts1-4    |wait           |wait on step completion                                                                                                                        |
|1000  |Run Script5 60 seconds |run Script     |shell          |script=longrunning.sh              |Args="-t 60 -rc 0"                        |Wait=No                                         |
|2000  |Run Script6 60 seconds |run Script     |shell          |script=longrunning.sh              |Args=60 -rc 0                             |Wait=No                                         |
|9999  |Wait until the end     |wait           |wait on step completion                                                                                                                        |
